meta_description: Stories have the power to inspire, change history and celebrate cultures. Visit Western Spirit and gain a new perspective of the American West today!
hours_text:
# Hours, Directions & Parking

## Museum Hours

**9:30 a.m. – 5 p.m** Monday (September 16, 2024 – May 19, 2025)  
**9:30 a.m. – 5 p.m.** Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday  
**9:30 a.m. – 5 p.m.** Thursday (May-October)  
**9:30 a.m. – 9 p.m.** Thursday (November-April)**  
****11:00 a.m. – 5 p.m.** Sunday

**2025 Holiday Closures:**  
New Year’s Day  
Easter Sunday  
Memorial Day  
Independence Day  
Labor Day  
Wednesday, November 26 – closing at 2 p.m.  
Thanksgiving  
Wednesday, December 24 – closing at 2 p.m.  
Christmas Day  
Wednesday, December 31 – closing at 2 p.m.

_Museum hours of operation may change._

## [Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251018124811/https://my.scottsdalemuseumwest.org/events)

Adult $28  
Senior $25  
Military $25  
Student $12  
Child 6-17 $12  
Child 5 and under free

## Tours

Public Docent-Led Tours are available (included with admission) at 11:20 am, 12:20 pm and 1:20 pm each day! For more information, [click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20251018124811/https://westernspirit.org/learn/docent-tours/)

For more information or to book your private group tour: [click here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251018124811/https://westernspirit.org/learn/docent-tours/) Group rates apply to Private Group Tours.

For any questions regarding Private Docent-Led Group Tours, email [grouptours@westernspirit.org.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251018124811/mailto:visitorservices@westernspirit.org)

collections_text:
# Western Spirit

Scottsdale's Museum of the West

Immerse yourself in stunning art, fascinating artifacts, and engaging exhibits of the North American West.

[Purchase Tickets](https://my.scottsdalemuseumwest.org/events)

  * [](https://westernspirit.org/project/fistful-of-colors/)
  * [](https://westernspirit.org/project/western-week/)
  * [](https://westernspirit.org/project/mac-schweitzer/)
  * [](https://westernspirit.org/project/curtwalters-resilience/)

## Current Exhibitions

[ ](https://westernspirit.org/project/curtwalters-resilience/ "Curt Walters: Resilience")
